attributes.action: To stop homework in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Homework should be stopped because children get little to no time to relax, and see family. Children get home and have to still do work after being at school all day, 5 days a week. This is causing stress for most children/teenagers across the UK, and mental health should be priority.
attributes.background: This is to stop homework for all schools across the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
